title: I3S point cloud scene layer: index
description: Describes the index (i.e. bounding volume tree) of the layer.

nodeVersion.description: The version of the individual nodes format.

nodePerIndexBlock.description: The page size describes the number of nodes per paged index document. 64 is currently expected.

boundingVolumeType.description: The bounding volume type. Only OBB is currently supported.
